Sentencas: Effects of the oxide substrate on the nickel (Ni) particle properties are examined by using a Ni agglomeration behavior analysis and Kelvin Force Microscope (KFM) technique.
Titulo: Effect of the oxide substrate on the nickel particle properties

Sentencas: Agglomerated Ni particles are formed after annealing a Ni thin film on oxide substrates of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and gadolinia doped ceria (GDC).
Titulo: Effect of the oxide substrate on the nickel particle properties

Sentencas: Nickel agglomeration is suppressed for the Ni particles on the GDC substrate compared to those particles on the YSZ substrate.
Titulo: Effect of the oxide substrate on the nickel particle properties

Sentencas: Although evaluated at room temperature, the surface potential of GDC is more positive than that of YSZ, while Ni particle surface potential is about the same for both the Ni/YSZ and the Ni/GDC systems.
Titulo: Effect of the oxide substrate on the nickel particle properties
